text: Tomaloke yetiya yud'dhalabdha sampada sangraha karaibalai yaba tetiya yisakale picha homhaka dichila, tetiya sihamte ahi ka’ba, ‘amako aponalokara lagata yabalai anumati diyaka’. Sihamte allahara bani paraibartana karaiba bicarae. Koraa, ‘tomaloke kono mate'i amara anusarana karaiba noraaraa. E'i ghosana allahe agate'i karai thaiche’. Sihamte arasye ka’ba, ‘baram aponaloke amaka hinsahe karae’. Nahaya, daraacalate sihamte ati saman'yahe buji paya
